#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int

using namespace std;

char s[100005];

int main(){
	int t;
	ll d,n,i;
    string sec,first;

	scanf("%d",&t);

	while(t--){

		sec="";first="";

		scanf("%s",s);
		n=strlen(s);
		scanf("%lld",&d);d=d-1;

		for(i=d;i<n;i++)
			sec+=s[i];

		if((n-d+1)%2==0){
			for(i=d-1;i>=0;i--)
				first+=s[i];
		}
		else{
			for(i=0;i<d;i++)
				first+=s[i];
		}

		sec+=first;

		cout<<sec<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
